ygData.subject: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)5
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a great story Shada.  Bet you made a friend for life with that tip. I would imagine that a lot of people have sold lambent stones to the gypsies in NK.
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a great story Shada. Bet you made a friend for life with that tip.

I would imagine that a lot of people have sold lambent stones to the gypsies
in NK. Nice to know that if I'm having trouble finding a giant hunting
party or someone selling a stone I can always try this option. Hard part
then would be picking the right gypsy:-)

Galtin of E'ci


> it shows the older items. my friend accidentally sold his mortificator
> staff to an npc. this is the only one we know of on our server, he got it
> in a GM event. i did not hear until about a week later, and he was still
> upset about it. i told him i heard if you go buy all of the items from
> the
> list it will eventually pop up. and it worked, he got the staff back, but
> he had to buy a bunch of stuff for it to show up. AND he even killed the
> vendor after he sold it, but when he repopped he still had the staff
> buried
> beneath all the junk.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
> Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
